Body:
x = np.linspace(-100, 100, 1000)
y = 10 * np.exp(-(x ** 2 / (2 * 20 ** 2)))
fix_rng = np.arange(200, 800)
als = AlsCvxopt(smoothness_param=1000.0, asym_param=1e-05, redux=1,
    fix_end_points=False, fix_rng=None, verbose=True)
y_als = als.calculate(y)
assert np.max((y - y_als)[200:800]) > 0.002
als = AlsCvxopt(smoothness_param=1000.0, asym_param=1e-05, redux=1,
    fix_end_points=False, fix_rng=fix_rng, verbose=True)
y_als = als.calculate(y)
assert np.max((y - y_als)[200:800]) < 0.002
